ticket: I was charged twice for my subscription this month.
sample_response: Apologize for the inconvenience, confirm the duplicate charge, and provide a refund timeline.

ticket: The app crashes every time I try to log in.
sample_response: Apologize and guide the user to reinstall the app or clear cache.

ticket: I forgot my password and can't access my account.
sample_response: Provide instructions for password reset.

ticket: My order hasn't arrived even though it was supposed to be delivered yesterday.
sample_response: Check tracking information and update the customer with estimated delivery.

ticket: Can I change my delivery address after placing an order?
sample_response: Explain the policy for changing delivery addresses.

ticket: I want to cancel my subscription and get a refund.
sample_response: Explain the cancellation process and refund eligibility.

ticket: The app takes too long to load and is very slow.
sample_response: Apologize for the inconvenience and suggest troubleshooting steps.

ticket: I received the wrong item in my order.
sample_response: Apologize and explain the replacement or return process.

ticket: I can't find my order history in the app.
sample_response: Guide the user to access order history.

ticket: I was promised a discount but it wasn't applied.
sample_response: Check the promotion terms and correct the order if applicable.

ticket: How do I update my payment method?
sample_response: Provide instructions for updating payment details.

ticket: The tracking link for my order is not working.
sample_response: Provide the correct tracking link or alternative tracking method.

ticket: I keep getting error messages when trying to checkout.
sample_response: Guide the user to troubleshoot checkout issues or try a different browser.

ticket: I accidentally subscribed twice, how do I cancel one?
sample_response: Explain cancellation process for duplicate subscriptions.

ticket: Can I change my delivery time for an existing order?
sample_response: Check if the delivery time can be modified and guide the user.

ticket: The app keeps logging me out randomly.
sample_response: Apologize and suggest troubleshooting steps or update the app.

ticket: I want to update my email address in my account.
sample_response: Provide instructions to update email.

ticket: My order was damaged when it arrived.
sample_response: Apologize and explain replacement or return process.

ticket: I didn't receive my cashback reward for last purchase.
sample_response: Check reward eligibility and provide guidance.

ticket: I am seeing unexpected charges on my account.
sample_response: Investigate the charges and provide clarification to the customer.
